name: Your worst friend
description:
Your worst friend is a Sweet Elite fangame where you play as Maty, a sociopath and weird student who forget the birthday of her only best friend Rapha! Help her to find a gift before tomorrow!

Warning: It is recommend to know few things about Sweet Elite before playing the game because main of the characters won't be introduced.

CREDITS:

Backgrounds: Made by morethan24hours, background artist for © Sweet Elite and one by Antaille
Music: Kevin Macleod
Sprite/Writing/GUI/Programming: Antaille

Sweet Elite belong to the Sweet Elite team and none of the information in the game are canon.
This game contains 12 unlockable illustrations and 11 endings!
